attributes.action: Increase Mental Health Beds In Bristol For Younge People
attributes.additional_details:
Thousands of younge people are suffering with zero access to help.
Parents and gaurdians helpless and desperate for help.
Children dying and becoming permanently damaged before they can even ask for the help they need.
attributes.background:
I’m after more CAHMs resources for the younge people of Bristol and s glos
Only ten inpatient beds and over year long waiting lists for younge people isn’t acceptable.
No in person CAHMs in the childrens hospital.
Younge people having to wait till Crisis and suicide before help isn’t good enough.

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local CAMHS provision are a matter for your local NHS Trust, not the Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Review and reform Child and Adolescent Mental Health Services: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/605314

Increase funding for crisis and acute mental health services: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/600251
